name: The Legacy of Isaelius
description:
A free fantasy action-RPG for Mac and PC

Take control of Dimitri, and seek revenge for the murder of your best bud, Isaelius.

For fans of Zelda, Earthbound, and amateur video games

This is a game I began developing in high school, and have only now finished to a reasonable degree, in third year university.

There are towns to explore, enemies to fight, shops to visit, and so on.

While it isn't polished to perfection, it is a complete game and I feel its time to release it.

If there are any major issues, feel free to let me know

Follow me @landermint
